titles.title: Fair Pay for Military Firefighters Act of 2004
A bill to make available hazardous duty incentive pay to uniformed service members performing firefighting duties.
Fair Pay for Military Firefighters Act of 2004

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: Fair Pay for Military Firefighters Act of 2004 - Amends Federal military pay provisions to include as hazardous duty, for purposes of eligibility for hazardous duty incentive pay, regular participation as a firefighting crew member, as determined by the Secretary of the military department concerned.
